nodes.text: A cantina was located in the capital city of the Inner Rim planet Pijal near the Pijali palace's stables. Around 40 BBY, Lord Regent Rael Averross visited the cantina after returning from riding his Pijal varactyl, and re-acquainted himself with Selbie, the establishment's hostess.
The cantina appears in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel written by Claudia Gray.
